short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your sourcing by automating the way you analyze and accelerating the buying process when engaging in online arbitrage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension that helps you search, analyze and find profitable products from the major retails online stores like Walmart, Target, Home Depot etc. Giving you a lot of information on the demand, competition, sales velocity and pricing history so you can make better buying decisions for your Retail and Online Arbitrage.

The software will give you the product information on Amazon's listing right on the product page in your favorite stores making sourcing and analyzing a very fast process.
